thread.title: 'Gladbach beats Wolfsburg 2-0 to cap Bundesliga turnaround
thread.title_full: 'Gladbach beats Wolfsburg 2-0 to cap Bundesliga turnaround

title: 'Gladbach beats Wolfsburg 2-0 to cap Bundesliga turnaround
text:
Borussia Moenchengladbach beats Wolfsburg 2-0 to cap remarkable Bundesliga turnaround THE ASSOCIATED PRESS   11:33   11:33   
People: 
Germany (196) 

BERLIN â€” Borussia Moenchengladbach defeated Bundesliga runner-up Wolfsburg 2-0 at home Saturday to cap a remarkable turnaround after its dismal start to the season. 
Raffael shrugged off Timm Klose's foul to cross for Havard Nordtveit to break the deadlock in the 76th and Lars Stindl produced a defense-splitting pass for Ibrahima Traore three minutes later, sealing 'Gladbach's third successive win after starting with five straight defeats. 
Hertha Berlin striker Vedad Ibisevic scored twice in as many minutes to seal a 3-0 win over Hamburger SV . 
Salif Sane's 59th-minute header was enough for Hannover to beat Werder Bremen 1-0 for its first win. 
Timo Werner equalized in the last minute for Stuttgart to salvage a 2-2 draw at Hoffenheim. 
Also, Ingolstadt defeated Eintracht Frankfurt 2-0 for its first home Bundesliga win.
